TopicTitle: Option to toggle science module readouts

Articles.Content:
One thing i was kind of dissapointed in with .22 was the lack of the ability to read the science reports in sandbox mode. What i would like to see is a toggle-able option to display the actual science reports in sandbox mode, and it could be given a box that pops up when you check it that warns about it being a spoiler and you'd have more fun leaving it off and playing career mode etc. one of the things that i liked about KSP is the sandbox mode, im a huge fan of sandbox games, and this is one thing that actually bugged me enough to make a suggestion about it.

Thanks for reading,
